Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which Robert Menendez is the "king" of raising money from Wall Street, as there are other senators who have received greater donations from the Securities & Investment industry.
Understate: The claim understates the amount of Wall Street money that Joe Kyrillos has raised, as records show he has collected nearly $60,000 for his current campaign.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Robert Menendez is the top recipient of Wall Street donations, as there are 14 senators who have received greater donations than him.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider that other senators, both Democrats and Republicans, have also received significant donations from Wall Street, suggesting that it may not be solely attributed to Menendez's actions or influence.
